---
layout: post
title: "The Revenant (2015) Review"
date: 2016-03-11
---

Always fun screening a movie at home and watching it with family. Was planning to watch this one long back, even more so after Leo, Iñárritu and Lubezki won Oscars.   

![img alt text](data:image/jpeg;base64,)   

My Rating : 4/5   

The depicted world is very realistic with many small details, great landscapes and camera views. The soundtrack is a perfect match to the film. Leo finally did it.   

Starts with a tragedy but the end fills you with satisfaction.   

Can't say anymore without spoilers. Go watch it!
